He wants to increase the capacity of his business, so as to be able to satisfy his clients and the demand for the service of washing vehicles and in this way gain more interested clients.  This will permit him to increase his business and give his clientele good care.   He is married and has two children, a six-month-old girl and a six-year-old boy, who attends school.

He has had a loan from Ceprodel in the beginning of 2011.  He invested the previous loan in supplies like air fresheners, soaps and grease remover.   At this moment he is applying for new financing since he has the need to buy a high-pressure machine that will permit him to wash vehicles in less time and with better quality.  In the photo, he is washing the motorcycle with this machine.  In this way he will obtain a better income to sustain his family and for this he is grateful to Ceprodel and to Kiva for the support that they provide him.

loans.use: to buy a pressure machine to wash vehicles.

loans.name: Maria Elena

texts.es:
Maria es una persona que ha tenido que atravesar por muchas adversidades en su vida, sin embargo siempre ha tenido la fortaleza para salir adelante y continuar progresando junto a sus hijos. Maria es una madre soltera cabeza de hogar de sus 2 hijos de 16 y 21 años de edad, pues su esposo murió hace un tiempo dejándola como la principal responsable de generar los ingresos que se requieren en su hogar para sostener los gastos que allí se generan. Junto con su esposo tenían un bar en el cual trabajaban para generar los ingresos de su familia, pero desde la muerte de su esposo el negocio no ha trabajado y el local estaba alquilado durante un tiempo; pero ahora que Maria ha retomado con la actividad de atender el bar requiere de un préstamo que le permita comprar surtido de bebidas y alcohol para satisfacer las necesidades de sus clientes.

Así podrá seguir generando mejores ingresos para su hogar permitiendo tener una mejor calidad de vida para sus hijos y mejores oportunidades económicas para progresar.
texts.en:
María is a person who has had to go through many adversities in her life.  However, she’s always had the strength to get ahead and continue making progress with her children.

María is a single mother head of household; she has two children who are 16 and 21 years of age.  Her husband died some time ago leaving her as the main person responsible for generating income needed in her home to cover expenses that arise there.

She and her husband owned a bar they worked in to generate family income but since her husband’s death she hadn’t worked and had been leasing out the bar.  Now that María has taken up the business again she needs a loan to buy a stock of beverages and liquor to meet customer demand so that she can continue generating better income for her home leading to improved quality of life for her children and better opportunities for economic progress.

loans.use: to buy liquor and beverages.

loans.name: Vestine

texts.en: Vestine is 38 years old. She has one child, who is 10 years old. With this loan, Vestine wants to buy more shoes to sell. With the profits from the sale of shoes, she wants to buy a plot of land.

loans.use: To buy more used shoes to sell.

loans.name: Hector Moreno

texts.es:
Hector es un joven emprendedor de 21 años que desde muy temprana edad comenzó a trabajar junto a su padre en la actividad de la agricultura, y gracias a toda la experiencia que ha adquirido, hoy es muy reconocido por la buena calidad que tienen sus productos. Desde hace unos 15 años viene trabajando en cultivar café y caña de azúcar en los terrenos que le presta su padre, y a su lado ha logrado sacar productos de muy buena calidad permitiéndose contribuir económicamente en su hogar para que su familia tenga una mejor calidad de vida y mejores oportunidades económicas para progresar. Debido a los cambios de climas que han afectado sus cultivos, Hector busca que un préstamo le permita comprar abonos, insecticidas y fungicidas para reabonar su cultivo y poder sacar sus productos de buena calidad.

Así superará la crisis del clima que ha hecho que su cultivo se venga deteriorando desde hace unos días, y superando la dificultad de capital que tiene para sacar adelante su cultivo.
texts.en:
Hector, 21, is an enterprising young man.  He learned farming from his father and has worked at it since he was just a boy.  His experience shows and he is known today for the good quality of his products.  When he was 15 years old, he started growing coffee and sugar cane on land owned by his father.  He produced a good crop that, in turn, provided an income that he contributed to supporting his family.  Climate change has affected Hector's crop and he is applying for a loan that he will use to buy supplies--fertilizer, pesticides, etc.--for repairing the damage and ensuring his next crop is better.  

This investment will provide Hector with the supplies that he needs to overcome his difficulties and succeed with his next crop.

loans.use: to buy supplies for his farming business.

loans.name: Pedro Nel

texts.es:
Pedro es una persona que siempre se ha caracterizado por ser muy trabajador y esto le ha permitido generar los ingresos que se requieren en su hogar para sostener los gastos que allí se generan. A pesar de las grandes adversidades que ha tenido que enfrentar en la vida, ha tenido siempre la fortaleza para salir adelante y continuar progresando junto con su esposa y sus 2 hijos. Cuando se quedó sin empleo no le quedó otra alternativa que comenzar a trabajar en la calle vendiendo dulces, y gracias a su esfuerzo ha logrado que con este negocio su familia pueda tener una buena calidad de vida y sus 2 hijos acceder a una educación. Actualmente en su negocio recorre varios sectores de la ciudad, y esto le permite tener cada vez un mayor número de clientes, y es por esto que ahora busca que un préstamo le permita comprar una chaza más grande para vender sus dulces y snack a sus clientes.

De esta manera ofrecerá una mayor cantidad ya que podrá contar con una mejor chaza, lo que se reflejará en unos mejores ingresos para su familia. Su mayor sueño es llegar a tener una comercializadora de dulces y así progresar financieramente mientras también genera empleo.
texts.en: Pedro has always been known as a very hard-working person.  This has enabled him to make the income he needs for his household and to cover his family's expenses.  In spite of the obstacles that he has faced in life, he has always had the strength to continue making progress together with his wife and two children.  When he found himself unemployed, Pedro had no other alternative than to start working in the street selling sweet treats.  Thanks to his hard work, his business has enabled his family to enjoy a good quality of life and his two children have had access to an education.  Pedro currently travels through several areas of the city selling his products.  This has enabled him to increase his number of customers.  He is now looking to take out a loan to buy a larger cart from which to sell his sweet treats and snacks.  He will be able to sell a larger quantity of goods as he will have a better cart.  This will make him better income for his family.  His biggest dream is to own a candy store so that he can make financial progress and also create jobs.

loans.use: to buy a larger cart for selling sweet treats and snacks to his customers

loans.name: Gloria Elena

texts.es:
Gloria es una persona que siempre se ha caracterizado por ser muy trabajadora, y gracias a esta condición ha logrado sacar adelante a sus 2 hijos a pesar de haber quedado viuda desde hace un tiempo. Como fuente de ingresos tiene un negocio de comidas rápidas el cual comenzó en un lugar con muchas incomodidades, sin embargo ha logrado salir adelante y con mucho esfuerzo logró conseguir su local para ubicar unas mesas y ofrecer así un mejor servicio para sus clientes. Desde que esta ubicada en el local sus ventas han aumentado considerablemente, y esto le ha permitido tener mejores ingresos para que en su hogar sus 2 hijos puedan acceder a una mejor calidad de vida y mejores oportunidades económicas para progresar. Sin embargo, ahora ha venido teniendo dificultades con las entidades sanitarias que le exigen la implementación de algunas mejoras para poder superar las condiciones higiénicas que se requieren en su negocio; es por esto que busca un préstamo para adecuar una mesa de acero inoxidable y la compra de un nuevo refrigerador para su negocio.

De esta manera logrará superar la dificultad de capital y su negocio saldrá adelante ofreciendo un mejor servicio para sus clientes. Además, seguirá generando cada vez mejores ingresos para su hogar de modo que sus hijos tendrán una mejor calidad de vida y mejores oportunidades económicas para progresar.
texts.en:
Gloria is a person who has always been noted for being very hardworking and thanks to this she’s managed to raise her two children despite having been widowed some time ago.  Her source of income is a business selling fast-food that she started in a location that had lots of shortcomings.  Nevertheless, she’s managed to get ahead and with much effort succeeded in getting a space in which to set up a few tables thus offering better customer service.  Since she’s been located here sales have increased considerably and this has led to improved household income; her two children are able to access better quality of life and better opportunities for economic progress.

However, now she’s having problems with the health department who are requiring a few improvements to meet health requirements for her business which is why she’s looking for a loan to set up a stainless steel table and to buy a refrigerator for her business.  In this way she will be able to overcome the problem of business capital and her business will move forward providing better customer service.  Also, she will continue generating higher income for her home each time so that her children will have a better quality of life and better opportunities for economic progress.

loans.use: to set up a stainless steel table and to buy a new refrigerator.

loans.name: Levis

texts.es: Levis  de 29 años de edad vive con su cónyuge y sus dos hijos en las edades de 7 y 9 años, en la hermosa ciudad de Cartagena de Indias, lugar ubicado a orillas del Mar Caribe,  uno de los sitios turísticos mas hermosos de Colombia y muy reconocido, pues   tiene una de las principales bases navales del país y  por su patrimonio histórico-artístico, que abarca de vestigios de época cartaginesa, romana, bizantina, edificaciones de carácter militar de época moderna y contemporánea, así como también edificios neoclásicos y modernistas.  Esta hermosa ciudad fue la que años atrás, la recibiera con los brazos abiertos, cuando llegó desde su pueblo natal ubicado en el Departamento de Córdoba,  para buscar paz, tranquilidad y un mejor futuro para sus hijos. Inicialmente se dedicó a vender productos fritos que ella misma elaboraba y siendo disciplinada y ahorrando,  logró ubicar un local y convertirlo en un restaurante, con buena ubicación en un barrio extenso y muy tradicional de esa ciudad. Poco apoco fue agregando, desayunos, almuerzos, y bebidas los fines de semana, que hoy le generan utilidades importantes para el sostenimiento de su familia. En la actualidad funciona en la terraza, a la que debió extenderse, porque el crecimiento de su clientela así se lo exigía y allí protegida por una carpa creció y hoy  envejecida por el tiempo, requiere que sea cambiada y con ello hacer adecuaciones locativas, porque poco protege de la lluvia y el incesante calor del Caribe.  Por esto y para brindar un ambiente cada vez más confortable a su clientela,   acude a un credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, con el cual comprará una cubierta y hará adecuaciones locativas, con los cuales impactará a su clientela que quieren cada vez mas disfrutar de los deleites de la comida de Levis, quien le agrega el principal ingrediente, que nos es otro que el Amor con que   trabaja diariamente en una relación con el cliente de gano-ganas.
texts.en:
Levis, 29, lives with her spouse and their two children who are 7 and 9 years of age in the beautiful city of Cartagena de Indias located on the shores of the Caribbean Sea, one of Colombia’s best-known tourist sites because it has one of the country’s main naval bases and its historical-artistic heritage encompasses Carthaginian, Roman and Byzantine military styles from both modern and contemporary ages as well as neo-classical and modern buildings.

This beautiful city in years past welcomed her with open arms when she arrived from her native town located in the Department of Córdoba seeking peace, tranquility and a better future for her children.  Initially she sold fried food she herself prepared and being well-disciplined she saved up and managed to open a locale she turned into a restaurant that’s well located in a spacious, very traditional neighborhood in the city.  Gradually she added breakfast, lunch and beverages on weekends that today generate notable profits to support her family.

It currently operates in a terrace that had to be enlarged because her clientele grew and protected by a tent it grew too.  The tent is now age damaged and needs to be replaced and some remodeling needs to be done too because it’s inadequate protection from the rain and the incessant Caribbean heat.

Because of this and in order to offer an environment to her customers that is more comfortable every day, she’s calling on a Kiva loan, her first financing with Fundación Mario Santo Domingo to buy a covering and to do some remodeling to impact her clientele who always want to enjoy the delicious food Levis prepares more and more which always has the special added ingredient, love, she always cooks with thus having a win-win relationship.

loans.use: to do some remodeling and to buy tenting.

loans.name: Luis Enrique

texts.es:
Luis tiene 28 años de edad, vive en la ciudad de Mala, en la cual se desarrolla mucho la agricultura en especial el cultivo de maíz, algodón, entre otros. Cuando dispone de un tiempo libre le gusta mucho escuchar música y poder disfrutar de uno  de sus platillos favoritos el cual es la riquísima “Sopa Bruta y la Carapulcra”. El logro estudiar la carrera de auxiliar contable y ahora trabaja desempeñando su carrera.

Con entusiasmo Luis se dirige a su trabajo diariamente, el se desempeña como auxiliar contable, trabaja alrededor de 8 horas al día y le gusta mucho su trabajo ya que con ello puede ayudar a solventar los gastos de su hogar, especialmente porque vive con sus abuelos a quienes quiere muchísimo y por ello los apoya; él cree que le va bien en su trabajo porque es responsable y sobre todo porque tiene muchas ganas de salir adelante.

Luis está muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado el podrá realizar mejoras en la vivienda de sus abuelos, como refacción de paredes, mejoramiento de pisos, entre otros, así de esta manera sus abuelos tendrán una mejor calidad de vida y el podrá trabajar más tranquilo y seguir luchando para hacer realidad su más grande sueño:”  Estudiar la carrera de Mecánica Dental”.
texts.en:
Luis is 28 years old and he lives in the town of Mala, where agriculture is greatly practiced, particularity corn and cotton. Whenever he has some free time Luis loves listening to music and enjoying one of his favorite dishes, the delicious “Sopa Bruta y la Carapulcra”*. He has succeeded in completing his an Assistant Accounting studies and he now works in this line of business.

With great enthusiasm Luis goes to work every day. He is an assistant accountant, he works around 8 hours a day and he likes his job very much, as thanks to this job he can help paying for his family’s expenses, even more so as he lives with his grandparents whom he deeply loves and for this reason he economically helps them. He thinks his job is going well because he is responsible and above all because he has a great desire to get ahead in life.

Luis is deeply grateful to Kiva lenders because thanks to their support she will be able to make improvements to his grandparents’ house such as repairing the walls and improving the apartment. This way his grandparents will enjoy a better standard of living, he will be able to feel more relaxed while at work and he well keep on fighting to make his biggest dream come true: “To study Dental Techinologies”.

<cite>*“Sopa Bruta y la Carapulcra” is a combination of Carapulcra (a beef, pork or chicken stew, often a mix of the three types of meat) and Sopa Bruta (a pasta, meat and vegetable dish)</cite>

loans.use: To make improvents to his granparents' apartement and to repair the walls.

loans.name: Maria Estella

texts.es:
Maria tiene una tienda general desde hace aproximadamente 4 años con la que ha logrado contribuir económicamente en su hogar para brindar una mejor calidad de vida a su esposo y sus hijos. A pesar de que la tienda fue montada con muy bajo capital, Maria con mucho esfuerzo ha logrado sacarla adelante y poder captar más clientes a medida que pasa el tiempo, y esto le ha permitido seguir creciendo y aumentar poco a poco los ingresos en su hogar para brindar mejor calidad de vida a su familia. Con el ánimo de ofrecer una mayor variedad de productos de la canasta familiar en su tienda, Maria busca un préstamo que le permita comprar productos de la canasta familiar para surtir su negocio y así ofrecer una mayor variedad de productos a sus clientes.

Su mayor anhelo es ampliar su negocio y tener una tienda más atractiva para los clientes del sector, y así poder incrementar sus ventas para tener mejores ingresos para el hogar.
texts.en:
Maria has had a general store for approximately four years.  With the store she has managed to contribute financially to her household.  She does this in order to provide a better quality of life for her husband and their children.  

Despite the fact that the store was set up with very little capital, through great effort Maria has managed to get ahead.  She has also been able to get more customers as time passes.  This has allowed her to continue growing and to, little by little, increase the income in her household in order to improve her family’s quality of life.

With the intention of offering a greater variety of basic needs products in her store, Maria is looking for a loan.  She will use the loan to buy basic needs products to stock her business.  This way she will offer a greater variety of products to her customers.

Her greatest desire is to expand her business and to have a more attractive store for the customers in her area.  This way she will be able to increase her sales in order to have better income for her household.

loans.use: to buy basic needs products to stock her business and offer a greater variety to her customers.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: To replace the body on her husband's rickshaw for his transportation business

loans.name: Reinaldo Manuel

texts.es:
Reinaldo se encuentra casado y tiene un hijo de 18 años de edad y para generar los ingresos de su hogar tiene una choza ubicada al frente de una reconocida clínica de la ciudad donde ofrece a sus clientes fritos y algunos alimentos más, y gracias a este negocio ha logrado sacar su familia adelante brindándole una buena calidad de vida. Anteriormente tenían un restaurante a una calle de distancia donde tenían una gran clientela y habían podido tener unos ingresos con los que sostenían sus gastos, pero debido a que el local no era suyo se vio en la obligación de salir de allí cuando se lo pidieron; fue así como consiguió ubicarse en la choza al frente de la clínica donde ya esta hace 8 años aproximadamente, y gracias a la buena atención que ofrece a sus clientes hoy cuenta con una gran clientela que le permite tener muy buenos ingresos. Debido a que su negocio fue montado con muy bajo capital, sus implementos como la vitrina, la greca para preparar el café y otros más son muy básicos y ya tienen muchos años de estarlos utilizando, es por esto que busca un préstamo para comprar una vitrina, una greca para preparar el café y hacer otras adecuaciones locativas para mejorar la presentación de su negocio.

De esta manera podrá tener un negocio más agradable para los clientes y así sus ventas aumentarán considerablemente, permitiéndole brindar a su familia una mejor calidad de vida y mejores oportunidades económicas para progresar.
texts.en:
Reinaldo is married and has an 18 year old son.   In order to generate income for his household he has a hut located in front of a well-known clinic in the city.  He sells his customers snacks and some other foods.  Thanks to this business he has managed to get his family ahead and provide them with a good quality of life.

He previously had a restaurant on a street some distance away where he had a lot of clientele.  He would have been able to have income from the restaurant to support his expenses.  However, due to the fact that he did not own the place, he was obliged to leave when they asked him to.  That is how he came to locate himself at the hut in front of the clinic approximately eight years ago.

Thanks to the good service he gives his customers he now has a big clientele, which allows him to have very good income.  Because his business was set up with very little capital, his implements like the display case, the machine to prepare coffee, and others are very basic and have been used for many years.  

That is why he is looking to a loan in order to buy a display case, a coffee maker, and other upgrades to improve the presentation of his business.

This way he will be able to have a nicer business for his customers.  His sales will increase considerably, which will allow him to provide his family with a better quality of life and better financial opportunities for advancement.

loans.use: to buy a display case, a coffee maker, and other upgrades to improve the presentation of his business.

loans.name: Bererna Bernarda

texts.es: Berena de 41 años de edad, vive con su cónyuge y sus dos hijos en las edades de 11 y 15 años, en la hermosa ciudad de Cartagena de Indias, lugar ubicado a orillas del Mar Caribe,  uno de los sitios turísticos mas hermosos de Colombia y muy reconocido, pues   tiene una de las principales bases navales del país y  por su patrimonio histórico-artístico, que abarca de vestigios de época cartaginesa, romana, bizantina, edificaciones de carácter militar de época moderna y contemporánea, así como también edificios neoclásicos y modernistas. Esta hermosa ciudad es el escenario donde modestamente habita y tiene su negocio, punto comercial donde vende útiles de papelería, variedades femeninas, domésticas y artículos variados, que poco a poco ha ido agregando de acuerdo con la demanda de  su clientela, la cual ha ido estructurando desde hace 3 años, desde que quedó desempleada y decidió dedicarse a esta actividad, con el fin de generar ingresos que contribuyeran al bienestar de su hogar. Inicialmente ofrecía el servicio de llamadas telefónicas y a celulares, posteriormente agregó avenas en envases de vidrio, golosinas, dulces y comestibles procesados industrialmente, como le fue muy bien, entusiasmada  compró un computador, empezó a ofrecer servicios de internet, adicionó transcripciones y finalmente productos de papelería, accesorios, artículos para el hogar y todo lo que exige su  clientela. Su olfato de negocio la ha ido encausando favorablemente, pues ha aprovechado muy bien las oportunidades que le ofrece el mercado, en el cual tienen como a sus principales clientes los estudiantes de colegios cércanos a su negocio. Su meta es continuar logrando el ensanchamiento de su clientela, pero su mayor desafío es no contar con el suficiente capital de trabajo para lograrlo. Esta es la razón por la cual acude a un credikiva, mediante el cual comprará papelería, útiles escolares, productos de aseo y medicamentos naturales.  Con esta inversión proyecta incrementar su potencial de ventas y generar nuevos ingresos que sirven de mucho al cumplimiento de sus sueños de aumentar cada vez más el  bienestar de su familia.
texts.en: 41-year-old Bererna lives with her spouse and her two children aged 11 and 15. They live in the charming town of Cartagena de Indias, a place located by the Caribbean sea. It's one of the most beautiful and well-known tourist sites in Colombia, because it has one of the most important naval bases in the country and also because of its historic and artistic heritage. This includes remains from the Carthaginian, Roman and Byzantine periods, military buildings of the modern and contemporary age, as well as neoclassical and modernist buildings. This charming town is the setting where she leads a modest life and runs her business. It's a store where she sells stationery items, products for women and for the household, and various merchandise she gradually added according to her customers' demands. She's been building a clientele for the past three years, ever since she became unemployed and decided to start this business so she could get an income to contribute to the welfare of her household. At first she offered phone and cell phone calling services, and later on she added oats in glass jars, candy, pastries and industrially processed foodstuffs. Finally, she added stationery items, accessories, home products and everything else her customers demanded. Her business sense has steered her favorably, since she has taken very good advantage of the opportunities provided by the market. Her main customers are the students of the schools located near her business. Her goal is to keep on expanding her clientele, but her biggest challenge is not having enough working capital for that. That's the reason why she requests a Kiva loan, which she will use to purchase stationery, school supplies, toiletries and herbal medicine. With this investment she intends to increase her sales potential and obtain new profits, which will very much help her achieve her dream of improving her family's well-being more and more.

loans.use: to purchase stationery, school supplies, toiletries and herbal medicine.

loans.name: Nestor

texts.es:
Nestor es una persona muy trabajadora que siempre se ha caracterizado por querer dar en su familia una mejor calidad de vida y progresar económicamente, para esto trabaja fuertemente en su negocio desde hace 8 años el cual es la fotografía y donde ofrece a sus clientes los servicios de primeras comuniones, matrimonios, eventos especiales, entre otros más. Gracias a la buena calidad de sus trabajos cada vez ha venido captando más clientes y esto ha permitido que en su hogar tengan una mejor calidad de vida y mayores oportunidades económicas para progresar, por esto se sigue esforzando para seguir saliendo adelante y seguir superando las adversidades que se le presentan. Con el ánimo de diversificar sus servicios, Nestor busca un préstamo para comprar una cámara de mayor calidad y comprar unos telones con los cuales pueda adecuar su estudio fotográfico.

De esta manera ofrecerá un mejor servicio para sus clientes y estos cada vez irán aumentando considerablemente, de modo que en su hogar gozarán de mejor calidad de vida y mayores oportunidades económicas para salir adelante. Su mayor sueño es tener un gran estudio fotográfico y seguir creciendo con el negocio ofreciendo cada vez mejores servicios.
texts.en:
Nestor is a hardworking person who has always been known for wanting to give his family a better quality of life and economic progress.  To do this, he has been working very hard on his business for 8 years.  He is a photographer who offers his customers services for first communions, weddings, special events, among others.  Thanks to the good quality of his work he has been gaining customers over time, and this has allowed him to have a better quality of life in his household and given him better opportunities for progress.  The reason he keeps exerting himself is to get ahead and to overcome the adversities that present themselves.  In an effort to diversify his services, Nestor is seeking a loan to buy a better quality camera and to buy some curtains to use in outfitting his photography studio.  

In this way, he will be able to offer better service to his customers and continue to increase his customer base considerably, so that his household will enjoy a better quality of life and better opportunities to get ahead.  His main dream is to have a large photographic studio and continue growing his business, increasingly offering better services.

loans.use: to buy a better quality camera and some curtains to use in his photographic studio

loans.name: Petrona Gricelda

texts.es: Petrona gricelda casada de 44 años de edad, tiene por actividad economica la  una pulperia ubicada en su casa de habitacion, desde hace 5 años  herramienta de trabajo que le ha servido para tener un medio de trabajo dignamente, el fiananciamiento lo quiere para invertir en la compra de productos de consumo diario como:  pan, leche, huevos, frijoles. Pastas, churritos, galletas, fosforos, condimentos, verduras, frutas, frescos naturales entre otros.
texts.en: Petrona Gricelda is married and is 44 years old.  Her economic activity is a store located in her home. Since 5 years ago, this resource has allowed her to have a dignified means of work.  She wants the financing to invest in buying products of everyday consumption like bread, milk, eggs, beans, pastas, churritos, cookies, matches, seasonings, vegetables, fruits and natural drinks, among others.

loans.use: to buy bread, milk, eggs, beans, pastas, churritos, cookies, matches, seasonings, vegetables, fruits and natural drinks, among others.

loans.name: Noe De Jesus

texts.es:
Noe es una persona que siempre ha sido muy trabajadora y gracias a esto ha podido salir adelante con su esposa y sus 10 hijos, pero hace un tiempo se quedó sin empleo y debido a la necesidad de generar los ingresos para sostener los gastos en su hogar decidió montar su propio negocio desde su casa. Con mucho esfuerzo inició una elaboración de pulpas de frutas las cuales comercializa entre sus vecinos y conocidos; adicionalmente tiene en la puerta de su casa una venta obleas que hacen que sus ingresos se incrementen y así pueda seguir brindándoles estudio a sus hijos. Gracias a la buena calidad de sus productos y el carisma que siempre lo ha caracterizado, ha logrado captar un gran número de clientes para su negocio, y ahora que tiene la oportunidad de seguir diversificando sus ingresos busca un préstamo para comprar un carrito de comidas para vender fritos afuera de su casa y aumentar sus ingresos para seguir ofreciendo educación universitaria a sus hijos.

De esta manera superará la dificultad de capital en su negocio y así saldrá adelante con su familia. Además, podrá tener una mejor calidad de vida y mejores oportunidades económicas para progresar.
texts.en:
Noe has always been a very hardworking person, and thanks to that he has been able to get himself, his wife and his 10 children ahead. However, some time ago he became unemployed and because he needed an income to support his household expenses, he decided to set up his own business in his house. With a lot of hard work, he started a business making fruit pulp, which he sells among his neighbors and acquaintances. In addition, he sells wafers at the front door of his house, which increases his profits so that he can continue to provide an education for his children. Thanks to the high quality of his products and the charisma he's always been known for, he succeeded in getting a large number of customers for his business. Now he has an opportunity to keep on diversifying his income sources, and he seeks a loan in order to purchase a food cart to sell fried foods outside his home. That way he'll increase his profits so he can continue to provide a college education for his children.
By doing that, he'll overcome financial difficulties in his business and get ahead along with his family. Besides, he'll be able to improve his living conditions and his opportunities to make economic progress.

loans.use: to purchase a food cart in order to sell fried food outside his home and improve his income, so he can continue to provide a college education for his children.

loans.name: Luz Audilia

texts.es:
La joven Luz Audilia es originaria del municipio de El Sauce, es una sauceña luchadora que se caracteriza como trabajadora con un futuro por delante y que uno de sus sueños es ver su negocio realizado.
Este negocio consiste en una pulpería donde ofrece abarrotería en general, ropa y bisutería y a pesar de su juventud tiene espíritu por salir adelante y dinamismo en cuanto a dicho negocio.
Es visitado por un sin número de clientes por la amabilidad de la dueña y por la variedad de productos con que cuenta este negocio, el cual tiene muchos años de operar.
En este momento tiene la necesidad de adquirir un préstamo, ya que necesita capital para surtir su negocio de productos variados que demandan sus clientes con el fin de satisfacer a los mismos y así ganar clientela el cual es su objetivo principal.
Por tal razón se acercó por primera vez a Ceprodel con el fin de que le otorguen un crédito para llevar a cabo su objetivo y así obtener mayores ingresos para sustentar sus gastos familiares y ayudar a su esposo a subsidiar dichos gastos.
Confía en Dios poder obtener este apoyo que son de gran ayuda para los pequeños comerciantes de nuestro país.
texts.en:
Young Luz Audilia comes from the town of El Sauce. She's a driven "sauceña" (a native of El Sauce) who works hard, has a bright future ahead of her and dreams of seeing her business established.
This business is a grocery store where she sells groceries in general, clothing and costume jewelry. Despite her young age, she's determined to get ahead and she's dynamic as far as her business goes.
It is visited by countless customers due to the owner's friendliness and the variety of merchandise available in the store, which has been open for many years.
She currently needs to get a loan, because she needs capital in order to stock up her business with various products demanded by her customers. She intends to keep her customers satisfied and therefore expand her clientele, which is her main goal.
For that reason she has turned to Ceprodel for the first time, so she can get a loan in order to achieve her goal. That way she'll increase her profits so she can support her family's expenses and help her husband pay for those expenses.
She trusts in God to get this support, which is of great help for the small businesspeople in the country.

loans.use: to purchase various garments, costume jewelry and groceries.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy cloth and thread for a sewing business.

loans.name: Feride

texts.en:
Feride is fifty-one years old. She is married and has two children with the youngest of two still attending university in a major city. Their family lives in the southeastern part of Albania. 

Just like many other people in the region, she has animals and owns some land as well. She plants crops and veggies and of course some apple fruit trees which is very typical in this part of the country. For the past eight years, she has been selling milk to the local dairy farms. Feride says, “The profit is fine, yet not enough when you are the only provider at home and have children to educate.“

This is Feride’s second time applying for a loan to buy a cow. Yet this time is different, because she is requesting it from KIVA via VisionFund Albania and she is excited. She is known and respected by all the people in the village for her personable, responsible and loving nature.

loans.use: to purchase a  milk cow.

loans.name: Luis Emilio

texts.es:
Luis es una persona que siempre se ha caracterizado por ser muy trabajador y gracias a esto ha logrado salir adelante brindándole una buena calidad de vida a su familia y superar las grandes adversidades que se le han presentado. Su negocio es una venta de ropa principalmente para hombres y lo tiene desde hace 25 años aproximadamente cuando se quedó sin trabajo y no tuvo otra alternativa que comenzar a buscar diferentes fuentes de ingresos para sostener los gastos de su hogar. Gracias a la experiencia que ha adquirido actualmente cuenta con una gran cantidad de clientes que le permiten tener muy buenas ventas y también sabe donde conseguir sus productos a precios bajos para luego comercializarlos. Debido a que se acerca la temporada de día del padre y allí sus ventas aumentan considerablemente, Luis busca un préstamo para comprar ropa masculina para el día del padre y así afrontar la temporada con un buen inventario.

De esta manera logrará satisfacer la demanda y aprovechar las buenas ventas de esta temporada, de modo que en su hogar podrán acceder a mejores oportunidades económicas y una mejor calidad de vida. Su mayor sueño es llegar a abrir un local propio donde pueda exhibir su mercancía, pero hasta el momento no lo ha podido hacer por los altos costos del arriendo de los locales comerciales.
texts.en:
Luis is a person who has always been known for being hard working and thanks to this he has gotten ahead providing a good quality of life to his family and overcoming the great adversities that have been presented. His business is primarily selling menswear and he has had it for about 25 years because he lost his job and had no other alternative except to begin to search for different sources of income in order to keep up with the household expenses.

Thanks to experience he currently has a lot of customers which permits him to have good sales and also he knows where to go to get good products at low prices in order to sell them later. Because Father’s Day season is approaching and his sales increase considerably, Luis is looking for a loan in order to buy menswear for Father’s Day and thus face the season with a good inventory.

In this way he will satisfy the demand and take advantage of the good sales of this season, so his household will have access to better financial opportunities and quality of life. His biggest dream is to open his own facility where he can exhibit his merchandise, but so far he has not been able to do so because of the high cost of renting commercial premises.

loans.use: to buy menswear for Father’s Day in order to face the season with a good inventory

loans.name: Sonya

texts.en:
Sonya is still managing her trading business. Thanks to her occupation Sonya is able to help her son to support their family. Her third Kiva loan Sonya used to buy winter season and holiday clothes to resell. 

Sonya always makes her loan repayments on time. Now she is asking for a $2,000 loan to buy a large lot of swimsuits to resell because swimsuits are in great demand during summer holidays.

loans.use: to buy a large lot of swimsuits to resell.

loans.name: Svetlana

texts.en:
Svetlana has two children, a son and a daughter, aged 11 and 18. She is married. 

Svetlana farms for a living. Her land is four hectares in size and she farms potatoes, beets, and carrots there. She sells her produce to the mass distributor. 

Previously, Svetlana used to irrigate her field by using water cannon. This is a very expensive way of irrigating and it is not very efficient. The water thrusts with such a force that it damages plants or emits so much water that it literally "drowns" the plant. At the same time, cannon can leave areas on the field under-irrigated. 

An irrigation system waters individual plants by emitting small amount of drops to the plant throughout the day. Agro film helps to retain the moisture rather than spilling it and during the night it helps to capture heat from the soil, keeping it warm. This technology helps to increase crop yield and make the harvest early.

Please help Svetlana to finance an irrigation system and agro film.

loans.use: to purchase an irrigation system and agro film, which will help to irrigate the soil and maintain optimal temperature.

loans.name: Roger Alejandro

texts.es:
El señor Roger Alejandro es una persona emprendedora. Actualmente tiene su propio establecimiento, antes vendía de forma ambulante. Labora seis días de la semana, desde las seis de la mañana hasta las tres de la tarde, en su negocio venta de comida el cual  consiste en ofrecer una variedad de alimentos, por la mañana, como leche agria, sándwich, café. Por la tarde con deliciosos almuerzos, como pollo frito, carne asada, enchiladas, gaseosas, refrescos naturales, tiene dos hijas una 3 años y otra de 9 años la cual asiste a la escuela, el trabaja en conjunto con su esposa quien es la que prepara la comida, Roger brinda atención  a sus clientes y realiza las compras diarias para su negocio. En la foto el aparece en su negocio con un plato de gallo pinto (arroz con frijoles) con queso, aguacate y plátanos fritos, una comida típica de Nicaragua. Esta asando carne en la parrilla en la cocina artesanal.

Ha sido cliente de la institución desde octubre del 2007, los prestamos anteriores los ha utilizados en la inversión de tener un lugar fijo, antes vendía de forma ambulante, y ha recibido créditos que el pueda pagar según su capacidad de pago.  Solicita el  préstamo a nuestra institución para invertir en capital de trabajo, para la  compra de productos como arroz, aceite, azúcar, carne, gaseosas para hacer más cantidad de comida, ofrecer variedad a sus clientes. También, quería reparar el techo de su negocio por que en época de invierno hay mucha lluvia, y no llegan clientes por temor a mojarse. Se siente agradecido con ceprodel y Kiva, por la confianza depositada en el, por medio de los prestamos a incrementado su negocio y ha mejorado su vivienda esto le ha permitido llevar el sustento a su hogar y tener  una  condición mejor de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Roger Alejandro is an enterprising person.  At present, he has his own establishment but previously sold his merchandise in the street.  He works six days a week, from six in the morning until three in the afternoon.  He is engaged in the business of selling meals and offers a variety of foods.  In the morning, he sells “leche agria” (a fermented milk product), sandwiches, and coffee.  In the afternoon, he sells delicious lunches such as fried chicken, roasted meat, enchiladas, soda, and natural soft drinks.  He has two daughters, ages three and nine, who attend school.  He works with his wife, who prepares the meals.  Roger serves the customers and makes the daily purchases for his business.  In the photo, he appears at his business with a dish of “gallo pinto” (rice and beans) with cheese, avocado, and fried bananas, a typical Nicaraguan dish.  He is frying meat on the grill in the artisanal kitchen.

He has been a client of the institution since 2007.  He used the earlier loans to invest in establishing a fixed location as he previously sold his merchandise in the street. He has qualified to receive loans based on his ability to pay.  He is applying for a loan from our institution to invest in working capital. He will purchase rice, oil, sugar, meat, and soda in order to prepare a larger quantity of meals and offer more variety to his customers.  Also, he wishes to repair the roof of his business because it rains heavily during the winter season, and customers don’t come for fear of getting wet.  He is grateful to Ceprodel and Kiva for placing their trust in him. Through means of the loans, he has expanded his business and made home improvements. This has allowed him to sustain his home and have better living conditions for himself and his family.

loans.use: to purchase products such as rice, meat, soda, and oil and to repair the roof of his business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase an irrigation system

loans.name: Allah Rakhi's Group

texts.en:
Allah Rakhi is married and is 52 years of age. Her husband is a welder by profession and provides welding services (which include repairing of iron and steel items) to his clients. 

Allah Rakhi has given birth to 4 sons. All of them are attached to different kinds of work and contribute financially to the family.
She has applied for a loan from KIVA partner, Asasah, for further expansion of her husband’s business. With the loan investment, he will buy iron and will also repair his welding machine. This will help him to provide better quality services to his clients and increase his profits.

loans.use: To buy iron for welding business

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy mobile accessories, phone sets and calling cards to improve her son's business.

loans.name: Patrocinia

texts.en:
Patrocinia is from Gata Diot, Clarin, Misamis Occidental. She is 78 years old. She is a widow and has  six children. 

To make a living, Patrocinia is running a general store, selling a variety of food and home use products in the local community. She has been in her business for eight years and earns 3,800 PHP a month for these activities.

Patrocinia is requesting a loan of 5,000 PHP, which will be used to purchase new items to expand her product offering. 

In 2007, Patrocinia joined GDMPC. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the loan to save as a reserve for future emergencies.

loans.use: to purchase new items to expand her product offering.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase an irrigation system to water his crop.

loans.name: Josefina

texts.en:
Josefina is married with three children. She is 41 years old and lives in Gata Diot, Clarin, Misamis Occidental, Philippines. 

Josefina owns and operates a plot of farm land, planting bananas to earn a living. She has been in this business for five years and earns PHP 5,000 each month.

She requested a loan of PHP 8,000 to purchase farm chemicals. Josefina has been a member of Kiva's partner, GDMPC, for a year. 

In the future, Josefina's plan is to save her returns in order to finance the studies of her children.

loans.use: to purchase farm chemicals.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy beauty products in order to begin selling them at her salon, and a display case

loans.name: Liezel

texts.en:
Liezel is a 27-year-old resident of Canicapan, Clarin. She provides for her child’s needs from the little amount of PHP 4,000 she gains monthly from her banana plantation business. She has had this business for three years as an aid to the income gained from her live-in partner. 

However, since 2011 she has been a member of GDMPC. Liezel applied for a loan at GDMPC microfinance for PHP 4,200 to buy fertilizer. 

Liezel wants to make an expansion to her business one day.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer.

loans.name: Raquel

texts.en:
Raquel is from Poblacion 4, Clarin, Misamis Occidental. She is 31 years old. Raquel is married and has four children. 

To make a living, she manages a fishing business. She has been engaged in her business for seventeen years and earns PHP 8,761 a month from these activities. 

In 2007, Raquel joined GDMPC. Raquel is requesting a loan of PHP 27,100, which will be used to buy new fish nets to expand the business. 

She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to buy new fish nets to expand the business.

loans.name: Uch

texts.en:
Uch, aged 38, is a resident of Baray district of Kompong Tom province.  She lives in a thatched house with her husband and four children. Like local villagers, she dedicates herself to the farming business to generate household income. She grows rice and vegetables to sell in each harvest season, and she can spend the income on food and allowances for her children. Her husband is supportive and always helps her in the business. 

Uch is now taking out a loan of KHR 1,500,000 to add to her capital to purchase a piece of land, on which she plans to build a new house if she has enough money. For her business goal, Uch would like to expand her farming business and increase her output.

loans.use: to purchase a piece of land.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase film to repair a greenhouse.

loans.name: Imelda

texts.en:
Imelda is widowed with six children, only one of her children goes to school. She also takes care of additional family members (grand children). She has a business of a restaurant and has been in this business for more than 10 years. She sells to all categories of people, both on retail and wholesale. She has applied for a loan of 2,000,000 Ugandan shillings (UGX) from MCDT- SACCO to buy more food staff like bunches of bananas, Irish and sweet potatoes, beef, chicken, and rice.

Imelda generates additional income through rental rooms and selling raw food. She works from her home and works six days a week. Her major business challenges include rainy seasons and defaulters. Imelda is aspiring of seeing her business grow big so that she owns a full restaurant and also to selling an outside catering section. She resides in her own house and the family has access to electricity and piped water. Her monthly expenses include paying utility bills and school fees.

loans.use: To buy more bunches of bananas, beef, rice, chicken, and Irish and sweet potatoes.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy a sewing machine for her son's tailoring business.

loans.name: Jane

texts.en:
Jane is married with six children and only two of her children go to school. She also takes care of two grandchildren.

She has applied for a loan of 2,000,000 Uganda shillings (UGX) from MCDTSACCO to buy more bales of used clothes. Jane has been in this clothing business for 28 years and sells to all categories of people both on retail and wholesale. She generates additional income through selling charcoal. Her major business challenges include seasonality and ever increasing prices of clothes.

Jane is aspiring of building of rental rooms and also to become a wholesaler. She resides in her own house and the family has access to electricity and piped water. Her monthly expenses includes school and feeding the family.

loans.use: to buy more bales of used clothes.

loans.name: Yuvinalis

texts.en:
Yuvinalis is a resident of Nyamira in South Rift Kenya.  He has been in farming for 27 years and farming income is the only source of livelihood for his family of 8 children.  His farm produces mainly maize, beans, tea and milk.  He runs his farm with the help of three farmhands on casual basis.

Yuvinalis has requested a loan of 50,000 KES from Juhudi Kilimo to help him buy an additional dairy cow.  He believes this will boost his milk output to meet his family's requirement as well as generate additional income to help pay for the education of his last four children.

Yuvinalis says poor road networks coupled with undeveloped markets are the main challenges to farmers in the area.  He is however appreciative of Juhudi Kilimo's technical support to smallholder farmers.

loans.use: buy a dairy cow

loans.name: Alfred

texts.en:
Alfred is a father of 6 children, all are adults save for the last two.  He has been in farming for 20 years in his rural home area of Nkubu in Central Kenya.  His farm currently produces maize, beans, coffee and milk, which he sells to the local middlemen as well as being consumed by his family.  He runs his farm with the help of one farmhand.

Alfred has made a loan request of 50,000 KES from Juhudi Kilimo to help him construct a zero-grazing unit for his dairy cows as well as construct a fish pond.  He says fish has become a popular delicacy in the region unlike before and stands to give better returns.  He adds that the expansion of his farming business will help him improve his family's living standard.

Alfred says other crops have been yielding low harvests and is the main reason for his venture into fish farming and expansion of his dairy business.

loans.use: construct a zero grazing unit and a fish pond

loans.name: Yuvenciah

texts.en:
Yuvenciah is pictured here with a donkey she uses to transport her supply to the market and supplying water into her farm, especially for the dairy cows. She is a mother of six children aged between 26 and 10 years with the last three children still schooling. She has been in active farming for 20 years with her farm producing and selling milk, maize, tea, coffee, and vegetables for the local market. She runs her farm with the help of one farmhand.

Yuvenciah has requested a loan of 50,000 Kenya shillings (KES) from Kiva partner Juhudi Kilimo to buy a dairy cow. She says this will improve her family income and boost their upkeep. She aspires to have a farm of at least three good-quality dairy cows for better farming income. She hopes the dairy business will help her buy a motorcycle to use in transporting produce to the market and graduate from her current use of a donkey cart.

She laments about the poor roads network, animal diseases, and occasional bad weather.

loans.use: To buy a dairy cow.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: buy a power generator

loans.name: David

texts.en:
David is a father of four children aged between 12 and 1. He lives with his family in his rural home in Nyamira, South Rift Kenya, where he also practices mixed farming besides running a hotel in the local market. He reiterates that farming is his main source of income, with the hotel business and building the bricks he occasionally makes being his supplementary income.

David has requested a loan of 60,000 KES from Juhudi Kilimo to construct a bigger dairy unit for his growing number of dairy cows, and buy a power generator which will help light his home at night as well as used to pump water to his vegetables farm and for his dairy cows.

David plans to buy more land for the further expansion of his farming business. He indicates that drought and occasional hailstones often result in huge losses.

loans.use: build a dairy unit and buy a power generator

loans.name: Ean

texts.en:
Ean is 24 years old, married and has been blessed with three lovely young kids. She permanently lives with her family in Kompong Cham province. Her main business is farming, from which she can generate income for her daily household expenses. Her husband, aged 32, helps her in maintaining the business.  He also devotes his time to work on a rubber tree plantation in the province.

To improve her business and raise a good income for her family, Ean decided to take out a loan in the sums of USD 1,000 to pay for the land costs and to purchase bean seeds, fertilizers, and pesticides. She said that she will work harder to earn more benefit from this investment. This loan will enable her to further improve her living standard and she believes that she will be successful in her business someday.

loans.use: buy land, bean seeds, fertilizers, and pesticides.

loans.name: Pech

texts.en:
Pech is 47 years old.  He is a widower who is responsible for two children, both of whom are married. Recently he lives with one of his sons and his daughter-in-law in a small house in Ornlong Veng district. 

Pech used to work as a soldier many years ago, but now he is in the business of cultivating rice and other crops on his own plot of farmland.  With income from this business, he can spend on food, clothes, and his daily expenses.

Pech is asking for an additional capital in the amount of USD 800 to purchase a piece of farmland to expand his current business. From this purchase, Pech believes that he will be able to obtain a fruitful harvest each season and thereby increase his household income.

loans.use: buy land to farm

loans.name: Thong

texts.en:
Thong is thirty-one years old, married and has three school-aged children. She strives to work hard because she wants to experience a good quality of life and provide all of her children opportunity for an education. She operates a hog-raising business at home. Moreover, she makes and sells Khmer white wine to the local people for additional income for the family. Thong feels happy because her husband is supportive and helpful in the two businesses.

In order to stabilize her businesses and make a consistent profit, Thong would like to borrow some funds in the amount of KHR 2,000,000 to purchase rice for distilling white wine. Also, with the remaining portion she will buy pig feed for fattening her pigs. In the coming years, Thong hopes to own a medium farm of pigs and supply meat in the vicinity of her commune.

loans.use: buy rice to distill white wine and pig feed

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: establish a fish pond

loans.name: Alfred

texts.en:
Alfred is a resident of Nyamira in South Rift Kenya.  He is a father of four children aged between 17 and 4 years, all are schooling.  He has been in farming for 15 years and sells his products, which include tea, milk and maize, to the local markets.  He also works as a carpenter besides farming.

Alfred has made a loan request amounting to 45,000 KES from Juhudi Kilimo to buy a dairy cow.  He says the dairy cow will improve his family upkeep and earn more income to educate his children.  He plans to expand his carpentry workshop and dairy business.  He adds that the currently products yields, especially that of maize, are too low to meet his family's needs, and calls for diversification as well as expansion for a more productive dairy business.

Alfred laments the poor road network as his major challenge, especially with delivery of products to the market.

loans.use: buy a dairy cow

loans.name: Lisbeth

texts.en:
Lisbeth is from Carmen Annex, Ozamis City, Misamis Occidental. She is 34 years old. Lisbeth is married and has 3 children. 

Lisbeth used her last loan to purchase raw ingredients needed to make products for sale. Her business has grown and become successful.  She's also  running a transport business as a way of generating extra income.  Lisbeth asks for a new loan to purchase vehicle spare parts and accessories. Positively, she hopes to be able to grow more of her business.

loans.use: buy vehiche spare parts and accessories

location.town: Carmen Annex, Ozamis City, Misamis Occidental

loans.name: Khim

texts.en:
Khim is a 50 year-old married woman who is responsible for four children – two are unmarried.  Khim lives with her family in the small village of Baray district, Kompong Tom province. 

Khim is a local rice farmer.  She provides rice mill services to local people for additional income.  And at the same time, Khim has owned and operated a small grocery store selling various kinds of products.  Her children serve as her motivation in pursuing this retail business.

Khim would like to borrow some funds from HKL and Kiva to purchase a motorcycle so her children can commute to school.  School is about six km from their home.   Khim wants one of her sons to become a doctor in the future.  She will try hard and save money for him.

loans.use: to purchase a motorcycle.

loans.name: Roselyn

texts.en:
Roselyn is from Poblacion 4, Clarin, Misamis Occidental.  She is 32 years old, married and has 3 kids. 

To make a living, Roselyn owns and operates a fish vending business.  She has been in business for five years and earns 8,000 PHP a month. 

In 2007, Roselyn joined GDMPC.  She is requesting a loan of 31,000 PHP to purchase fishing equipment including hooks and nets.  She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase fishing equipment including hooks and nets.

loans.name: Angelina

texts.en:
Angelina is from Poblacion 4, Clarin, Misamis Occidental.  She is 64 years old, married and has 3 children. 

To make a living, Angelina has owned and operated a fishing business for 11 years and earns 10,000 PHP a month. 

In 2007, Angelina joined GDMPC.  She is requesting a loan of 41,000 PHP to purchase fishing equipment including hooks and nets.  Angelina plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to purchase fishing equipment including hooks and nets.

loans.name: Editha

texts.en:
Editha is from Clarin, Misamis Occidental.  She is 33 years old, married with two children.  

Editha used her last loan to purchase additional product to sell.  Her business is successful and she's taking a new loan to purchase additional seeds, seedlings and young crops to raise.  

In the future she hopes to grow her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional seeds, seedlings & young crops to raise

loans.name: Susan

texts.en: Susan is 45 years old and married. She lives in Carmen Annex, Ozamis, Misamis Occidental, Philippines. Susan used her last loan to purchase new equipment and tools to expand the business. Her business is successful, and she's now taking care of her transport business. She seeks a new loan to buy accessories. In the future, she hopes to be able to grow her business.

loans.use: to buy accessories.

location.town: Carmen Annex, Ozamis City, Misamis Occidental

loans.name: Zaragul

texts.ru: Зарагул  дорожит и любит свою семью. Она воспитывает своих детей, которым от 1 до 16 лет. Зарагул занимается куплей продажей детской одежды и обуви более пяти лет. Товары она приобретает в одном из самом популярном рынке г.Душанбе в Корвоне. В последнее время  она понимает, что нужно пополнит свой оборотный капитал и расширить ассортимент своих товаров. Жизнь становится труднее, её дети растут и нужно еще лучше их содержать. Она обратилась к нам в надежде получить займ. Она просит  вас понять и помочь ей с расширении её бизнеса. Зарагул заранее благодарит тех, кто откликнется на её просьбу.
texts.en: Zaragul loves and cherishes her family. She is bringing up her children, who range from one to 16 years of age. For over five years, Zaragul has been reselling children's clothing and shoes. She stocks up at Korvon, one of the most popular markets  in the city of Dushanbe. Lately she realized that she needed to replenish her working capital and expand her stock. Life keeps getting harder; her children are growing, and she needs to provide even better care for them. She turned to use in the hope of obtaining a loan. She asks you to have compassion and help her with business expansion. Zaragul thanks all who will respond to her request in advance.

loans.use: to buy goods for the new season.

loans.name: Samros' Group

texts.en:
Sour is 42 years old, married and mother of seven children, six of whom depend upon her. 

To make a living, she and her husband have been farming rice for 22 years and they supplement their family’s income by planting rubber trees.  They sometimes work for others for a fee. 

Sour’s group consists of three women who live in the same village of the Ponhea Krek district of Kampong Cham province.  

She is her second loan cycle, while the other two members are seeking their first loans from Kiva partner, VisionFund. 

Sour, who is the leader, will user her portion to buy fertilizers for her farmland.  She hopes this loan will enable her to increase her crop yield so as to make a better living.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer.

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Ponhea Krek district

loans.name: Chrorn's Group

texts.en:
A resident from a rural village of the Me Mot district, Chrorn is a 52-year-old mother of seven children, five of whom are dependent on her and still in school. The family's main sources of income have been rice farming on 1.5 hectares of farmland and cassava planting on 2 hectares of farmland, for the past 25 years and 10 years, respectively. Chrorn currently can earn about KHR 29,600 daily from her business for daily expenses. 

This is the second loan for Chrorn’s group of three female members. They successfully repaid their first loan with VisionFund. Now Chrorn is leading her group in applying for a loan of KHR 1,200,000 per member. As the leader, she will use her portion to buy fertilizers for her farmland and use the remainder to pay for labor and land plowing. Chrorn hopes this loan will enable her to increase her income so as to improve her standard of living.

loans.use: To buy fertilizers for her farmland

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Me Mot district

loans.name: Khim

texts.en:
Khim, aged 37, is married and has three children. She permanently lives with her children in Ornlong Veng district while her husband works as a soldier standing at the Cambodia-Thailand border. She operates a rice farming business as the family's main source of income, which she spends for her daily sustenance and to send all of her children to a local school. Despite her hardships, Khim wants to improve her business and experience a good quality of life. 

Recently, Khim hired some construction laborers to repair her house. Due to the lack of capital, Khim decided to ask for a loan of US $600 to purchase construction supplies such as whitewash and marble floors. With the support of this loan, Khim hopes that her house will be finished soon. She is very happy and thankful to lenders.

loans.use: to purchase construction supplies such as whitewash and marble floors.

loans.name: Thorn

texts.en:
Thorn, 41 years old, is married and lives in a thatched roof house in a rural village in the Dambae district of Kampong Cham province. She and her husband have six children, one of whom is still in school while the others work at the family’s business. For almost 20 years, Thorn and her husband have earned a living through farming rice and planting cassava, earning approximately 22,000 KHR per day to support the family. 

This is the first loan for Thorn with Kiva’s partner, VisionFund. She is requesting 2,000,000 KHR to buy fertilizers and rice seeds for her farmland. She hopes to make more crop yields and sell them for a good price so as to improve her lifestyle.

loans.use: To buy fertilizers and rice seeds for her farmland

loans.name: Volver A Empezar I Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “VOLVER A EMPESAR” iniciará el segundo ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal de Los Andes, está compuesta por nueve integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva donde la señora Francisca es la Presidenta. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos tenemos: venta de verduras, servicios de cafetería, serigrafía, venta de carne, venta de jugos, venta de plásticos, artículos varios, tienda de ferretería, venta de juguetes.

La señora Francisca, indica que hace año y medio que integra Pro Mujer, ingresando por invitación de una amiga que en la actualidad es socia de nuestra institución. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio elaboración y venta de ropa, ella cuenta que realiza los tejidos desde hace cinco años atrás y posteriormente lo  vende en las ferias de la ciudad.

El crédito que ahora sacará es para la mejoramiento de sus productos (compra de máquina de tejer) mismo que comprará de las distribuidoras de la ciudad de El Alto y posteriormente a la elaboración lo venderá en su espacio de venta todas las tardes. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar en lo posible a su familia, pues ella vive en concubinato y tiene dos hijos.  

Cuando se le consulta que le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta todo el servicio que se da en la institución.

En la fotografía observamos a la prima de la señora Beatriz, que se encuentra en el fondo, misma que se caracteriza por tener cabello blanco, ella quizo acompañar a su prima y al grupo.
texts.en:
The communal bank "Volver a Empesar I" began its second cycle with Pro Mujer as part of the Los Andes Focal Center. It is made up of nine members and is headed by a board with Francisca as president. The businesses that members of the communal association are in are varied, and among them are: vegetable sales, cafeteria services, silk-screen printing, meat sales, juice sales, sale of plastics, sundries, hardware items, and toy sales. 

Francisca indicates that she joined Pro Mujer a year and a half ago, at an invitation from a friend who is a member of the institution. Currently she has a business making and selling clothing, she has been knitting textiles for five years and later selling them at the city street markets.

The loan that she is taking out now is to improve her products (to buy a knitting machine) which she will buy from the distributors in the city of El Alto and later she will create and sell her work at her business site every afternoon. This form of work permits her to generate resources in order to support, however is possible, her family as she lives with her partner and two children. 

When asked what she likes about Pro Mujer, she replied that she likes all the services that the institution offers.

In the photograph we can see Beatriz’s cousin, who is in the background, with white hair. She wanted to accompany her cousin and the group.

loans.use: to buy a knitting machine

loans.name: Sopha

texts.en:
Sopha, 28, lives in a rural area of the Dambae district of Kampong Cham province and is married with two children, who are all still in school. The family’s main sources of income are from planting cassava (a type of edible root) on one-hectare (10,000 square metres) of farmland and selling pork in the local village. She has been in this business for seven years. Low crop yield is still a main challenge for her family’s business. 

To support her business, she is requesting a loan of 4000000 KHR with Kiva’s partner VisionFund. She will use this loan to buy fertilizer for her farmland and use a portion of it to pay for labor and land plowing. With this loan, she hopes to make more income so as to improve her living conditions and keep her children in school.

Sopha has been with VisionFund for one cycle and completely paid back the loan, which helped her relieve her family's burden and improve their prospects.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer for her farmland.

loans.name: Carlos Mario

texts.es:
Carlos se encuentra casado y tiene 3 hijos y para generar los ingresos de su hogar tiene una choza de venta de dulces y helados, y gracias a esto su familia puede gozar de una buena calidad de vida. Desde muy temprana edad Carlos comenzó a trabajar y gracias a toda la experiencia que ha adquirido ha podido conocer mejor los clientes, las maneras de vender y así poder tener un buen negocio. Debido a que proviene de una familia con muy pocos recursos económicos le ha sido difícil salir adelante por su propia cuenta ya que debía aportar en su hogar para sostenerse económicamente, pero ahora que se encuentra casado y tiene sus propios hijos su situación económica ha mejorado un poco y esto le ha permitido tener una mejor calidad de vida. Gracias a que se ha esforzado mucho, sus ventas han venido aumentando, por esto busca un préstamo para comprar dulces, snack, helados y otros productos que se han ido agotando.

Así podrá seguir ofreciendo en su hogar una buena calidad de vida a su esposa y sus hijos y también podrá tener una mejor calidad de vida y mejores oportunidades económicas.
texts.en: Carlos is married and has three children.  For an income to pay for his family’s expenses he has a hut where he sells sweets and ice cream, and thanks to this his family can enjoy a good quality of life.  Carlos started to work when he was very young and because of all the experience that he has acquired, he has been able to better know his customers, how to sell, and thus to have a good business.  Since he came from a poor family, it’s been difficult for him to get ahead on his own since he had to help support his family, but now that he is married and has his own children, his financial situation has improved a little.  This has allowed him to have a better quality of life.  Thanks to his great effort, his sales have been increasing and that is why he is asking for a loan to buy sweets, snacks, ice cream and other products that have been selling out.

loans.use: to buy sweets, snacks, ice cream and other products that have been selling out

loans.name: Marivic

texts.en:
This is Marivic, 34, a resident of Dasmarinas, Cavite, Philippines. She is a mother of 3 children. She, together with her children, manages their household while operating the business. At this time, she is working hard to continually provide income for their everyday expenses.

Marivic operates a variety store. In the Philippines, a variety store is basically a small convenience store, which sells groceries, toiletries, and beverages to the local neighborhood. It is the place to buy one sachet of shampoo, a Php 5-worth of cooking oil, or an egg. Marivic sells supplies at wholesale prices and by the piece. Her store is located adjacent to her house. Her regular customers are her neighbors and the local community. She earns a minimum of Php 400 in sales every day.

To help her continue the operations of her business, she is requesting a Php 13,000 loan. She will be utilizing the loan to buy groceries, toiletries, and beverages to expand her product inventory. She expects a boost in her income as she expands her business. 

Marivic hopes to be able to expand soon. She also hopes to send her children to school so they can graduate from college. She faithfully meets up with her co-fellowship members to share stories of her work every week. She also draws strength and inspiration from the Word of God that she studies.

* All CCT community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay microfinance loans.

loans.use: To buy grocery items and products for her business

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy sand, cement, and gravel to tile [his] living room and bedrooms.

loans.name: Chan

texts.en:
A rural villager from the Dambae district of Cambodia, Chan is 46 years old and married, with five children, who are still in school.  He and his wife are hardworking farmers who earn a living through farming rice and cassava. To gain more income and better support the family, they also plant cashews. He and his wife have been in this business for almost twenty years. 

Chan has been with Kiva’s partner, VisionFund, for five loan cycles.  He successfully paid back all five loans. The loans from VisionFund have helped the family’s business prosper and enabled Chan to have a better house.  Currently, he is able to earn about US$10 per day. 

Now he is requesting a loan of US$1,000.  He will use this loan to buy fertilizers and seeds for his farmland and a portion of it to spend on labor. He hopes this loan will enable him to increase his business to make more income, so as to make a better living.

loans.use: To buy fertilizers and seeds for his farmland and to hire labor.

loans.name: Alva Luz

texts.es:
Alva desde los 15 años de edad se encuentra dedicada a la actividad de la confección, pues la aprendió de su familia y gracias a esto ha logrado generar ingresos con los cuales contribuía económicamente en su familia para tener una mejor calidad de vida. Actualmente se encuentra casada y tiene 2 hijos de 4 y 13 años de edad, y durante mucho tiempo trabajó para empresas de confección donde podía generar ingresos para contribuir económicamente en su hogar, pero desde que nació su hijo menor, hace unos 4 años, se vio en la obligación de dejar su trabajo ya que siempre ha estado con dificultades de salud. Fue así como se vio en la obligación de dejar su empleo y desde entonces montó el taller de confección en su casa para así poder estar al pendiente de su hijo al mismo tiempo que puede trabajar para generar ingresos con los cuales puede contribuir a una mejor estabilidad económica del hogar. Debido a que su taller fue montado con muy bajo capital solo cuenta con las máquinas básicas para la confección, pero ahora se ha estado viendo perjudicada debido a que por la baja capacidad de producción que tiene no puede recibir los encargos de sus clientes y así su negocio se ha visto afectado. Es por esto que busca un préstamo para comprar una máquina fileteadora y así aumentar su capacidad de producción para poder recibir mayores encargos por parte de sus clientes.

De esta manera las ventas en su taller de confección aumentarán considerablemente y los ingresos para la familia podrán ser mejores, permitiendo que en su hogar sus 2 hijos y su esposo tengan una mejor calidad de vida. Su sueño es sacar sus 2 hijos adelante y que su hijo menor recupere su salud y pueda tener una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Since she was 15 years old, Alva has been sewing. She learned how from her family, and thanks to that she has been able to generate an income with which she contributes financially to her family in order to improve their quality of life. 

She’s married and has two children aged 4 and 13 years old. For a long time she sewed in a factory where she was able to earn money to contribute financially to her household. But when her youngest was born, who’s now 4 years old, she saw the need to leave her job since he had always had health problems. That was how she saw the need to leave her employer and then establish her sewing shop in her home in order to be able to look after her child while being able to work and earn money with which to improve the financial situation at home. Since she started her shop with very little money, she only has basic machines to sew. But now she is hampered by limited production capabilities. She can’t fill customer orders, and her business is being affected. It’s for this reason that she seeks a loan in order to buy a filleting machine as well as increase her production capabilities in order to be able to take more of her customers’ orders. 


In this way her sewing shop's sales will increase considerably, and the income for her family will increase, allowing her two kids and husband a better quality of life. Her dream is that her kids will be successful, that her youngest will get better, and that she can have a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy a filleting machine and increase production capabilities in order to take more customer orders.

loans.name: Luis Alberto

texts.es:
Luis Alberto se encuentra casado y tiene 2 hijos de 3 y 17 años de edad a quienes siempre les ha querido brindar una buena calidad de vida, es por esto que trabaja fuertemente desde hace mucho tiempo en una empresa de cultivos de flores y con su salario puede aportar los ingresos que se requieren en su hogar. Gracias a que ha adquirido una gran experiencia en el trabajo, ahora busca tener su propio proyecto de cultivos de flores con el que siempre ha soñado, y por esto busca un préstamo que le permita comprar abonos y riegos para sacar adelante su propio cultivo de flores.

Hace aproximadamente 10 días sembró las primeras flores en un terreno que alquiló y gracias al buen manejo que le ha dado este ya viene presentado favorables resultados. Su mayor sueño es llegar a tener su propio cultivo y poder generar más ingresos que los que genera actualmente con su empleo y así pueda progresar con su familia. También tiene el sueño de tener su casa propio y brindar así a su familia una estabilidad en el hogar.
texts.en:
Luis Alberto is married and has 2 children of 3 and 17 years of age. He has always wanted to bring to them a good quality life and to do this he has worked hard in the  business of growing flowers. With his salary he can contribute the required earning for his house.
